ctu_text: \n", "briefDescription": "Through the \"Advanced Training in Handicrafts\" scheme, candidates will be sponsored for training in other states where the craft is practised to its finest. ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \"Advanced Training in Handicrafts\" Component of the \"Development of Handicrafts\" Scheme is introduced by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry, to provide advanced training to individuals seeking to master exquisite craft skills.
